Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Given its exceptional quality and features, it is valued at $8000 by us. Considering its unique value proposition, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive introductory price of $7200. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you're interested. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
